title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.185 - Vaults: accessibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.185 - Vaults: accessibility

State Regulations

Each vault must be located in an accessible location and, so far as practical, away from: (a) street intersections or points where traffic is heavy or dense; (b) points of minimum elevation, catch
basins, or places where the access cover will be in the course of surface
waters; and
(c) water, electric, steam or other facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.185

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
